column2: This file is for me, Korba, to place localisation that should probably be rewritten before release rather than place it into the main localisation files. Feel free to add your own.
Other files might need your help, torture_localisation, flea_ixa_localisations
Inform the main plotter.

You go on an amazing adventure but Korba right now is uninspired and so can't think of an event chain to write. He's also waiting for the adventure framework from teotl. Good News! You have the Amulet of Kings!  Tea and biscuits all-round!
[From.GetBestName] (the plotbacker) informs you that an attempt will be made to kidnap the target whilst they're travelling.
Make it so.
I don't think this is such a good idea.
Text to notify the victim they've been kidnapped by [From.GetTitledFirstName].
Oh no!
Tell us more about this mythical realm of Yokuda.
column3: Dites-m'en plus sur ce royaume mythique de Hindoustan.
column4: Erzählt uns mehr über dieses mysteriöse Reich der Hindustani.
column6: Cuéntanos más acerca de este mítico reino de Indostán.

column2: Kidnap Succeeds.

Supporters of the Blue and Yellow teams have clashed at the Imperial Arena and riots have broken out! The City Guards are fighting to contain the situation, but the Blades are also standing by. They would make mincemeat of any hooligans before the riot has a chance of spreading to other districts, but there could be significant collateral damage...
column3: Les supporters des Bleus et des Verts s'affrontent dans l'Hippodrome et des émeutes ont éclaté ! La Garde de la cité se bat pour contenir la situation, mais la Garde varègue est aussi au garde-à-vous. Ses hommes vont hacher menu tous les vandales avant qu
column4: Unterstützer der blauen und grünen Streitwagen-Mannschaft sind im Hippodrom aufeinandergestoßen und Ausschreitungen sind losgebrochen! Die Stadtwache kämpft darum, die Situation unter Kontrolle zu halten, doch die Warägerwachen halten sich bereit. Sie wür
column6: ¡Los seguidores de los equipos Azul y Verde tuvieron un enfrentamiento en el Hipódromo y los disturbios han estallado! La Guardia de la Ciudad está luchando para controlar la situación, pero la la Guardia varega también está en estado de alerta. Ellos harían picadillo a cualquier alterado para evitar que los disturbios se expandieran hacia otros distritos, pero eso provocaría inumerables daños colaterales...

column2: Hundreds of rioting supporters are hacked down as the Katana-wielding Blades charge into their ranks. Many attempt to flee, but the Blades give chase and show no mercy to those they catch. The streets are littered with the mangled corpses of hooligans... and a few dozen innocent bystanders. The Blades can be a brutal tool when needed but one to be wielded with care.
column3: Des centaines d'émeutiers, des supporters de courses de chars, sont massacrés sous la hache des Nordiques qui chargent dans leurs rangs. Plusieurs tentent de s'enfuir, mais les Varègues les prennent en chasse et n'ont aucune pitié pour ceux qu'ils attrape
column4: Hunderte von aufrührerischen Streitwagen-Unterstützern werden niedergemetzelt, als die axtschwingenden Wikinger in die Ränge stürmen. Viele versuchen zu fliehen, doch die Waräger verfolgen sie und zeigen denjenigen, die sie erwischen, keine Gnade. Die Str
column6: Cientos de fanáticos exaltados son descuartizados con las hachas de los hombres nórdicos. Muchos de ellos tratan de huir, pero los varegos no dudan en darles caza y no muestran ningún atisbo de piedad. Las calles están llenas de cadáveres mutilados de gamberros  aficionados... y unas cuantas docenas de personas inocentes. Los varegos son una arma bruta que debe ser manejada con mucho cuidado.

column2: The City Guard pulls in reinforcement from the other districts and finally manage to disperse the rioting crowds. Many neighborhoods are burning and looting is widespread in those districts the Guard was forced to abandon, but the loss of life is relatively small.
column3: La Garde de la cité appelle en renforts des membres d'autres secteurs et ils arrivent enfin à disperser les émeutiers. Plusieurs quartiers brûlent et ceux que la garde a été forcée d'abandonner ont été pillés, mais les pertes humaines sont relativement fa
column4: Die Stadtwache holt Verstärkung aus den anderen Distrikten hinzu und schafft es schlussendlich, die ausschreitende Menge zu zerschlagen.Viele Nachbarschaften wurden niedergebrannt und Plünderung ist weitverbreitet in den Distrikten, die von der Wache gezw
column6: La Guardia de la Ciudad consigue refuerzos de otras barriadas y finalmente logra dispersar las multitudes vandálicas. Fuego y saqueos son comunes a lo largo de aquellos distritos donde la Guardia se vio obligada a abandonar, pero la pérdida de vidas humanas es relativamente pequeña.

column2: [From.GetFirstName], your impudent daughter, seems to have fallen head over heels in love with one of your Blades bodyguards, and the feeling is mutual. She has asked your permission to marry the man.
column3: [From.GetFirstName], votre fille effrontée, semble être tombée follement amoureuse de l'un de vos gardes du corps varègues, et ce sentiment est réciproque. Elle vous a demandé la permission d'épouser cet homme. Il semble qu'il appartient à une famille de
column4: [From.GetFirstName], Eure unverschämte Tochter, scheint sich bis über beide Ohren in einen Eurer Waräger-Leibwächter verliebt zu haben und die Gefühle beruhen auf Gegenseitigkeit. Sie hat Euch um Erlaubnis gebeten, diesen Mann heiraten zu dürfen. Anschein
column6: [From.GetFirstName], tu insolente hija, parece haberse enamorado locamente de uno de tus guardaespaldas varegas, y el sentimiento es mutuo. Ella te ha pedido permiso para casarse con él. Según parece, él pertenece a alguna nobleza menor del helado Norte, pero difícilmente puede decirse que es “de buen linaje”.

Event fires on Plot Backer, informs Plot Backer of chance to kidnap target while target is asleep in their chambers.
[From.GetBestName] (the plotbacker) informs you that an attempt will be made to kidnap the target whilst they are in their chambers.

Out one night at an ungodly hour you find yourself alone in a darkened street. You hear a rustling from the shadows, and before you know it someone is holding you fast and you feel a sharp pain at your neck, and moments later all is darkness...
Eep!
A carriage ride in the countryside can be so peaceful, so relaxing...and so far away from the prying eyes of city guards. It provides an excellent opportunity to launch a kidnapping.
Excellent indeed.
[From.GetFirstName] has worked out a deal with local bandits to have [plot_target.GetFirstName] kidnapped the next time [plot_target.GetSheHe] is traveling by carriage.
Next stop - the dungeons of [Root.Capital.GetName]!

While out traveling, my carriage is suddenly halted. I glance outside to see a small army of bandits slaughtering my guards! I step outside the carriage, and fight for my life...but I find myself quickly overwhelmed by the attackers who gag me, tie me up and throw me inside a cloth sack. When my bindings are finally removed, it is by a guard in a dungeon cell who sternly tells me that I'm a captive of [From.GetBestName]!
Curse you, [From.GetFirstName]!

While out traveling, my carriage is suddenly halted. I glance outside to see a small army of bandits slaughtering my guards! I step outside the carriage and join in the fighting. Leading my surviving retainers, we defeat our assailants, none of whom survive the battle.
That should make the roads a little safer...

While out traveling, my carriage is suddenly halted. I glance outside to see a small army of bandits slaughtering my guards! I step outside the carriage and join in the fighting. Leading my surviving retainers, we defeat our assailants, and interrogate the band's lone, badly-wounded survivor. "We were sent by [From.GetBestName] to kidnap you," he claims. "I swear, this was [From.GetHerHis] idea - not mine!"
[From.GetFirstName] will pay for this!
The ruffians hired out to kidnap [plot_target.GetFirstName] have reported that [plot_target.GetSheHe] is now a prisoner within the confines of my dungeon!
Excellent!
The ruffians hired out to kidnap [plot_target.GetFirstName] were found dead, their corpses left for the scavengers. Thankfully, [plot_target.GetFirstName] is unaware of my involvement.
Alas!
The ruffians hired out to kidnap [plot_target.GetFirstName] have been defeated, and one of them was cowardly enough to reveal my involvement in the matter!
Curses!
Refuse Liege Requests

Render yourself unavailable to appointment upon your liege's Council.  This is perfect for those who would rather stay at home without constantly getting asked by their liege to occupy a job. Your liege may still attempt to recruit you as a Commander.
Permit Liege Requests
You have decided to make yourself available to your liege.  You will now be able to receive job requests and to lead your own armies.
The Houseless
The Houseless are the exiled and unaligned members of Dunmer society.

My people bow and kotow to my every whim, and I care for them as a stern father cares for his wayward children. It is the Mane's place to lead his people forth, to find new lands for them to run free and to spread the philosophies of the Riddle'Thar to the four corners of Nirn.
I am a strong, powerful Mane!

The place of the Mane is not one of domination. He is there to guide his people and show them the ways of the Riddle'Thar, to encourage them to play freely in the sands and jungles of our home, but also to defend it against those that would see us harm. To do this, I must unify my people. To step beyond our lands is to draw the troubles of mer and men upon us.
I am a traditionalist Mane.
I do not much care for this business of politics, I'd much rather just lounge around and be fed by my servants. Being a Mane is such a tiresome business...
So what if they call me weak, I am the Mane none-the-less!

Dovah
Paarthurnax

Once a brutal lieutenant of Alduin's during the Dragon War and responsible for untold atrocities and destruction, Paarthurnax turned from his brother's violent and destructive ways, teaching mortals the use of thu'um and leading to the eventual banishment of Alduin from time and the devastation of his own race. At the close of the Dragon War, Paarthurnax became a student of the Way of the Voice and eventually became the Grandmaster of the Greybeards.
Alduin, the World-Eater

The first born and once the greatest of Akatosh's creations. In his pride he sought to conquer Mundus for himself and made claims of godhood, leading to a rebellion amongst his own kin against his rule. As the World-Eater, Alduin is seen as a malevolent force who destroys the world periodically and his return is seen by the Nords as the end times.
Ancient Dragon

Fearsome and nigh unstoppable are the Ancient Dragons, those few that survived the Dragon War and the banishment of Alduin, living into the twilight years of the second era and perhaps beyond. It would take great cunning, magic or an Army to defeat such an enemy.
Elder Dragon
Powerful Dragons that have seen the passing of centuries, the rise and fall of Kings and their Kingdoms are known simply as Elder Dragons.
Dragon
A large reptilian creature capable of flight, they are considered by many to be little more than ferals and monsters but are in fact sapiant and capable of great feats of magic.
